navfooter.footer-info-text: Feel free to get in touch with us at ACP Loads to unlock a world of efficient and reliable logistics services. We understand the importance of seamless communication in the logistics industry.

main.title: Your Ultimate Trucking Loadboard - Fast, Reliable, and Efficient
main.sub-title: Efficient logistics management ensures timely delivery, reduces costs, and improves customer satisfaction and loyalty.

daily-posted.title: Daily Posted Loads
daily-posted.description: At ACP Loads, our numbers tell the story of a dynamic and thriving freight community. Our statistics highlight the robust activity on our platform, ensuring that carriers, brokers, and shippers have access to a high volume of opportunities every day.

why-choose.title: Why Choose ACP Loads?
why-choose.description: Welcome to ACP Loads, the most dynamic and efficient trucking load board designed to streamline freight matching and optimize logistics. Whether you're a Carrier Dispatcher, Carrier, Broker, or Shipper, our platform is built to simplify your work and help you move freight faster than ever.
why-choose.fast-posting-description: Instantly post loads, find shipments, and match empty trucks with available freight.
why-choose.user-interface-description: Our intuitive workspace ensures load details are easily accessible for quick decision-making.
why-choose.rating-review-description: Carriers and Brokers can rate and review each other, fostering transparency and trust.
why-choose.matching-system-description: Carriers posting empty trucks will automatically attract loads that match their criteria.

who-benefits.title: Who Can Benefit?
who-benefits.brokers-benefit-1: Post loads and find available empty trucks.
who-benefits.brokers-benefit-2: Connect with Shippers to fulfill their shipments.

who-benefits.carriers-benefit-2: Attract loads based on truck availability.
who-benefits.shippers-benefit-2: Get connected with Brokers and Carriers in real-time.

trust-and-transparency.description: We believe in building a trustworthy freight network. Thatâ€™s why our platform allows Carriers and Brokers to rate and review each other based on key performance metrics:

our-vision.title: Our Vision
our-vision.description: We envision a future where every freight transaction is seamless, transparent, and efficient. By harnessing innovative technology and fostering a collaborative environment, ACP Loads aims to be the go-to platform for every stakeholder in the logistics ecosystem.

how-it-works.title: How It Works - Seamless Freight Matching for Everyone!
how-it-works.description: ACP Loads is designed to connect Freight Shiâ€‹ppers, Brokers, Owner-Operators, and Carriers in a fast, efficient, and cost-effective way. Our platform makes it easy to post, find, and move freight with ZERO fees!

card-1.title: Carriers & Dispatchers
card-1.description: Gain instant access to thousands of load opportunities. Whether you manage a fleet or operate as an individual, our platform helps you quickly match available trucks with suitable loads, saving time and boosting profitability.

card-2.title: Freight Brokers & Shippers
card-2.description: Post your loads effortlessly and reach a broad network of reliable carriers. Our streamlined sign-up process ensures you can list your shipments quickly, so you spend less time on administration and more time on moving freight.

card-3.title: Owner-Operators
card-3.description: Enjoy direct access to high-quality freight tailored to your truckâ€™s specifications. With our easy sign-up, you can connect with shippers and brokers looking for dependable owner-operators, ensuring you maximize your earnings and reduce downtime.

card-1.title: Visit Our Registration Page:
card-1.description: Navigate to our simple sign-up form where you'll provide basic contact details and select your role (Carrier, Dispatcher, Freight Broker, Shipper, or Owner-Operator).

card-2.title: Complete the Form:
card-2.description: Fill out the necessary information - donâ€™t worry, it only takes a few minutes. Carrier Dispatchers can register without needing an MC number, making the process even quicker.

card-3.title: Get Verified:
card-3.description: Once you complete the registration, our system will verify your details. Youâ€™ll receive instant confirmation and immediate access to our full range of features.

card-4.title: Start Connecting:
card-4.description: Begin exploring load opportunities, posting shipments, or finding available trucks. With your account activated, youâ€™re ready to join a thriving community thatâ€™s driving the future of US trucking logistics.

features.title: Empower Your Freight Operations
features.description: Discover a cutting-edge loadboard platform designed to streamline your US trucking logistics. With our intuitive interface, you can quickly post and search for loads, leverage smart matching with real-time notifications, and utilize advanced tools - like a freight rate calculator and live loadboard statistics - to make data-driven decisions. Our secure, mobile-friendly solution, integrated with top mapping services, ensures efficient routing and enhanced productivity across your entire operation.

Get started now and see how competitive your pricing can be!

terms-and-conditions.title: Know Your Rights and Responsibilities
terms-and-conditions.description: Welcome to ACP Loads, the premier trucking loadboard connecting carriers, brokers, and shippers across the U.S. Before using our services, please take a moment to review our Terms and Conditions to understand your rights, obligations, and the guidelines for using our platform.

Our platform is designed to simplify load searching, streamline dispatching, and enhance operational efficiency, all without requiring an MC number for registration.

freight-and-logistics-blog.title: Freight & Logistics Blog:
freight-and-logistics-blog.sub-title: Your Trusted Source for Industry Insights
freight-and-logistics-blog.description: Stay Ahead in the Fast-Paced World of Freight & Logistics!

card-1.title: Stay Informed
card-1.description: Get timely updates on industry trends, regulations, and freight markets.

card-2.title: Data-Driven Insights

card-4.description: Explore how digital loadboards, TMS systems, and automation are transforming logistics.

card-5.title: Real Success Stories
card-5.description: Get inspired by companies, brokers, and carriers achieving remarkable results.

1.title: Trucking Industry Snapshot:
1.description: The U.S. trucking industry in mid-2025 is navigating a freight recession, with spot market rates stabilizing but overall demand remaining weak. Overcapacity continues to pressure carriers, while diesel prices have seen a modest 4% drop since the start of the year.

2.title: Key Highlights:
2.text-1: Driven by e-commerce and consumer demand, short-haul loads are increasing, especially in metro areas.
2.text-2: Long-haul freight is shifting to intermodal solutions due to cost savings.
2.text-3: Load rejections are trending upward (currently around 7%), signaling tightening capacity in some regions.
2.text-4: Recent trade tensions have caused temporary rate surges, especially on imported goods, but these are now easing.

1.title: Pre-2000 Truck ELD Deadline:
1.text: Starting June 2025, all trucks - including pre-2000 models - must comply with the ELD mandate. No more paper logs.

2.title: DOT Medical Certificates Go Digital:
2.text: From June 23, 2025, medical certificates will be electronically submitted to state agencies, streamlining the process for drivers.

3.title: English Proficiency Enforcement:
3.text: Roadside inspections will now verify driversâ€™ English-speaking ability as part of FMCSAâ€™s safety compliance checks.

1.title: Focus on Short-Haul Efficiency:
1.text: With long-haul capacity decreasing, carriers can maximize profits by optimizing short-haul routes.

2.title: Monitor Real-Time Loadboard Data:
2.text: Adjust strategies based on shifting load densities, rejection rates, and spot market changes.

3.title: Carrier-Broker Partnerships:
3.text: Strengthen relationships by leveraging live rates, transparent communication, and reliable dispatching tools.

1.title: Fuel Prices Down:
1.text: Diesel costs have decreased by about 4% since January.

2.title: Geopolitical Risks Remain:
2.text: Middle East shipping disruptions could still create volatility, so keep an eye on global tanker rates and supply chain bottlenecks.

1.title: Use Smart Loadboards:
1.text: Live data, real-time rates, and verified load details help build long-term trust between brokers and carriers.

2.title: Transparent Pricing:
2.text: Brokers offering real-time rate visibility foster loyalty with carrier partners.

1.title: Digital Freight Platforms Rising:
1.text: More brokers and carriers are adopting advanced TMS and AI-powered logistics solutions.

2.title: Autonomous Truck Pilots:
2.text: Self-driving truck routes are expanding in Texas and Arizona, potentially reshaping the industry in the coming years.

1.title: Data-Driven Rates:
1.text: Use dynamic pricing tools that factor in fuel costs, market capacity, load volumes, and regional trends.

2.title: Freight Calculators:
2.text: Real-time freight rate calculators help carriers and brokers negotiate more competitively.

guides-and-videos.title: Learn How to Get the Most from ACP Loads
guides-and-videos.description: Whether you're new to freight logistics or a seasoned industry pro, this page is your go-to source for practical tutorials, walkthroughs, and step-by-step guides. Discover how to get the most out of ACP Loads, based on your role in the trucking ecosystem.
guides-and-videos.choose-role-description: ACP Loads is built for the entire freight lifecycle. Select the role that fits you to explore personalized guides and instructional videos:

faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.description: Welcome to the ACP Loads FAQ section. Below you'll find detailed answers grouped by user roles, along with general platform information to ensure you have all necessary details.

carrier-dispatcher.title: Carrier Dispatcher FAQs
carrier-dispatcher.q-1: Do I need an MC number to sign up as a Dispatcher?
carrier-dispatcher.a-1: No. Dispatchers can register without an MC or USDOT number.
carrier-dispatcher.q-2: What can I do as a Dispatcher?
carrier-dispatcher.a-2: You can search for broker-posted loads using advanced filters like origin, destination, date, trailer length, and load type.
carrier-dispatcher.q-3: Can I post loads or trucks as a Dispatcher?
carrier-dispatcher.a-3: No. Dispatchers can only view and book available loads.
carrier-dispatcher.a-4: You must upgrade your account to â€œCarrierâ€ status to leave reviews or ratings.

carrier.title: Carrier FAQs
carrier.q-1: Whatâ€™s required to register as a Carrier?
carrier.a-1: Youâ€™ll need an MC or USDOT number, which will be validated and auto-filled from FMCSA.
carrier.q-2: Can I post my available trucks?
carrier.a-2: Yes. Carriers can post available trucks for brokers and shippers to see.
carrier.a-3: Yes. You can contact brokers or shippers who posted loads and book directly.
carrier.q-4: Can I add other users to my account?
carrier.a-4: Yes, if youâ€™re a verified user, you can verify or invite others under the same MC.
carrier.a-5: Yes. You can rate brokers on communication, service, payment speed, and reliability.

broker.title: Broker FAQs
broker.q-1: How do I sign up as a Broker?
broker.a-1: Enter your MC/USDOT number and verify your company details retrieved from FMCSA.
broker.q-2: What can I do on the platform?
broker.a-2: Post loads, search for available trucks, and connect with carriers and dispatchers.
broker.q-3: Can I find loads from shippers?
broker.a-3: Yes. Brokers can also browse available shipper loads.
broker.a-4: Yes. Brokers can rate carriers on service level, punctuality, and care.
broker.q-5: Can I work with ACP Loads via API?
broker.a-5: Yes. If your system supports auto-load posting, contact us to integrate.

shipper.q-1: How do I register as a Shipper?
shipper.a-1: Register with your company details. MC or USDOT numbers aren't required, and your role is automatically set to Shipper.
shipper.a-2: Yes. Shippers can easily post loads that become available to brokers.
shipper.q-3: How do shippers track posted loads?
shipper.a-3: Shippers can view all interactions, responses, and matched trucks via their dashboard.
shipper.q-4: Can Shippers review brokers or carriers?
shipper.a-4: Shippers can view ratings and reviews but do not directly rate brokers or carriers.

general-platform.title: General Platform FAQs
general-platform.q-1: Is ACP Loads free to use?
general-platform.a-1: Currently, ACP Loads is entirely free with full access to all features.
general-platform.q-2: How do I update my company or personal information?
general-platform.a-2: Use the ACP Directory or Help section to request information updates.
general-platform.q-3: What should I do if I suspect unauthorized access?
general-platform.a-3: Immediately contact support through the Help section to secure your account.
general-platform.q-4: Can I customize my ACP Loads experience?
general-platform.a-4: Yes, ACP Loads offers language preferences, themes (ACP Style and Classic), and dark or light modes.
general-platform.q-5: How do I get support for technical issues?
general-platform.a-5: How do I get support for technical issues?
general-platform.q-6: Is ACP Loads available on mobile devices?
general-platform.a-6: Yes, ACP Loads is fully responsive and accessible on all devices.
general-platform.q-7: How can I partner with ACP Loads or become an affiliate?
general-platform.a-7: Visit our 'Partnership & Affiliate' page to learn about collaboration opportunities.
general-platform.q-8: How do I provide feedback or report bugs?
general-platform.a-8: Feedback and bugs can be reported through the platformâ€™s Help section or directly via email to our support center.

about-us.title: Welcome to ACP Loads  -  Empowering Americaâ€™s Freight Connections
about-us.description: ACP Loads is an innovative US-based trucking loadboard platform dedicated to bringing efficiency, transparency, and reliability to the logistics industry. Whether you are a carrier, dispatcher, broker, or shipper, ACP Loads is designed to simplify your workflow and accelerate your business growth.
about-us.our-mission-description: Our mission is simple: To connect shippers, brokers, carriers, and dispatchers through a fast, user-friendly, and secure digital platform. We believe in creating opportunities for everyone in the logistics supply chain by leveraging technology and industry expertise.

who-we-serve.title: Who We Serve
who-we-serve.description: We proudly support all key players in the freight and logistics industry:
who-we-serve.carrier-dispacther-description: Find the best loads quickly, no MC number required.
who-we-serve.carriers-description: Discover high-quality loads, post your empty trucks, and expand your network.
who-we-serve.brokers-description: Post shipments, match loads with carriers, and manage your relationships.
who-we-serve.shipper-description: Post loads with ease and gain access to a nationwide network of trusted brokers and carriers.

about-us.technology-driven-logistics-description: ACP Loads integrates the latest digital tools to streamline freight matching, automate processes, and ensure up-to-the-minute information for all users. From our intuitive dashboards to our secure cloud infrastructure, we empower logistics professionals to work smarter, not harder.

card-1.title: Fast & Easy
card-1.description: Get instant access to real-time loadboard data and opportunities.

card-2.title: Smart Tools
card-2.description: Use advanced search filters, calculators, and analytics to make informed decisions.

card-3.title: Total Transparency
card-3.description: Review company ratings, read testimonials, and communicate directly with partners.

card-4.title: Free Access
card-4.description: Enjoy all our core features at no cost during our promotional period.

meet-our-team.title: Meet Our Team
meet-our-team.description: Our leadership and development team includes logistics veterans, technology innovators, and passionate customer advocates, all working together to make ACP Loads the trusted partner for your transportation needs.

our-commitment.title: Our Commitment
our-commitment.1: Customer Success: Your experience is our top priority. Our support team is always ready to help.
our-commitment.2: Data Security: We safeguard your data and privacy with industry-leading protections.
our-commitment.3: Continuous Improvement: We listen to user feedback and rapidly evolve our platform to meet your changing needs.

contact-us.title: Contact Us
contact-us.description: Any questions or remarks? Just write us a message!
contact-us.get-in-touch-description: Have an inquiry or some feedbak for us? Fill out the form below to contact our team.

leadership.title: Meet the Team Behind ACP Loads
leadership.description: At ACP Loads, leadership means more than managing a platform - it means inspiring innovation, championing trust, and driving the freight industry forward. Our leadership team brings together decades of experience in logistics, technology, and customer service. We believe that by combining industry knowledge with a passion for digital transformation, we can solve the biggest challenges in US trucking.

1.title: Integrity
1.description: We lead by example, upholding the highest ethical standards and putting our customers first in every decision.

2.title: Innovation
2.description: Our leaders are relentless about exploring new solutions, leveraging data, and staying ahead of trends to keep our platform and users competitive.

3.title: Collaboration
3.description: We work closely as a team - and with our users, partners, and industry stakeholders - to create real, lasting value for the entire logistics ecosystem.

4.title: Accountability
4.description: We own our results, welcome feedback, and hold ourselves responsible for continuous improvement and customer satisfaction.

card-1.title: People-First Approach
card-1.description: Our leaders know that technology is only as strong as the people who use it. Thatâ€™s why we invest in building genuine relationships with our community of carriers, brokers, shippers, and dispatchers. We listen, respond, and evolve - so our platform reflects real-world needs.

card-2.title: Continuous Learning
card-2.description: The freight industry is changing faster than ever. Our leadership team is committed to ongoing education and staying at the forefront of logistics trends, regulatory shifts, and digital transformation. We embrace change, encourage creativity, and foster a culture of curiosity and growth.

card-3.title: Transparent Communication
card-3.description: Trust is earned through honesty and openness. Our leaders are dedicated to clear, timely communication with users and partners. We value feedback and see every comment, question, or concern as an opportunity to improve.

card-4.title: Ethical and Responsible Innovation
card-4.description: We hold ourselves to high ethical standards. Whether itâ€™s data security, fair business practices, or unbiased decision-making, our leadership sets the tone for a trustworthy and reliable platform.

1.title: Nick Charles

2.title: James Smith

3.title: Emily Davis
3.description: Emily is the voice of our users, making sure every feature, update, and support response is driven by customer needs.

4.title: Jack Adams
4.description: Jack leads the development of innovative, secure, and reliable digital tools for the ACP Loads community.

msg-from-leadership.title: Message from Our Leadership
msg-from-leadership.description: â€œACP Loads is more than a platform - itâ€™s a partnership with the hard-working men and women who keep America moving. Our mission is to make your day simpler, your business more profitable, and your experience more rewarding. We invite you to join us, share your ideas, and help us build the future of logistics together.â€

testimonials-and-reviews.description: At ACP Loads, our mission is to deliver efficiency, transparency, and real value to every member of the US logistics and trucking community. The feedback and experiences of our users - Carriers, Brokers, Dispatchers, and Shippers - drive our continuous improvement and innovation. Hereâ€™s what our community has to say about working with ACP Loads.

card-1.text: â€œACP Loads makes it so easy to find hot loads and get paid quickly. Their rating system helps us choose who we want to work with.â€

card-3.text: â€œPosting loads is fast and seamless, and the dispatcher network brings quality carriers directly to our shipments.â€

card-4.text: â€œACP Loads has helped our brokerage expand our reach and maintain great relationships with both shippers and carriers.â€

card-5.text: â€œWe reduced empty miles and improved on-time deliveries by using ACP Loads for all our freight posting needs.â€
